body:
> CI error is due to tests using .find(Icon). I should probably figure out why that works locally for me but not on Circle.

I imagine that you and Circle are using different versions of Firefox. Could that do it? It may also be a Linux vs OSX thing?
body_text:
CI error is due to tests using .find(Icon). I should probably figure out why that works locally for me but not on Circle.

I imagine that you and Circle are using different versions of Firefox. Could that do it? It may also be a Linux vs OSX thing?
body_html:
CI error is due to tests using .find(Icon). I should probably figure out why that works locally for me but not on Circle.

I imagine that you and Circle are using different versions of Firefox. Could that do it? It may also be a Linux vs OSX thing?
